name: Master Of Marbles
description: Marble game with power ups, time goals and unlockable marbles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: 2ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 260 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: 3ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti Storage: 4 GB available space
